company.name: Orbit Power
company.description: At Orbit Power, our vision is to be the best-in-class service provider to transmission utilities while ensuring high operational standards and employee growth. We deliver integrated utility solutions with a commitment to ethics, integrity, and transparency.
company.mission: To deliver innovative electrical engineering solutions that power progress, enhance safety, and contribute to a sustainable future. We are committed to exceeding client expectations through technical excellence, creative problem-solving, and unwavering dedication to quality.
values: Ethics and Integrity in all our operations
Transparency with our clients and stakeholders
Customer Care as our primary focus
Timely Delivery of all our commitments

team.name: Rajesh Kumar
team.bio: Over 20 years of experience in electrical engineering and utility management with a focus on operational excellence.

team.name: Priya Khanna
team.bio: Expert in advanced electrical systems and technology integration with a background in smart grid solutions.

team.name: Amit Singh
team.bio: Operations expert with extensive experience in managing large-scale electrical infrastructure projects PAN-India.

team.name: Neha Sharma
team.bio: Lead electrical engineer with expertise in transmission and distribution systems and safety compliance.
